      • validateUser

        public User validateUser(ValidateUser_Params params)
        Validates user credentials.
        Parameters:
        params - A ValidateUser_Params object containing the user's name and password
        Returns:
        A User object if the operation succeeds. If the operation fails it returns null.

      • getProjects

        public java.util.List<Project> getProjects(ValidateUser_Params params)
        Returns information about all of the available projects.
        Parameters:
        params - A ValidateUser_Params object containing the user's name and password
        Returns:
        A list of all the available project objects. Returns null if the operation fails.

      • getSampleImage

        public java.net.URL getSampleImage(UserAndProject_Params params)
        Returns a sample image for the specified project.
        Parameters:
        params - A UserAndProject_params object containing the user's name and password as well as the project id
        Returns:
        The URL of the sample image. Returns null if the operation fails.

      • downloadBatch

        public DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(UserAndProject_Params params)
        Downloads a batch for the user to index.
        Parameters:
        params - A UserAndProject_Params object containing the user's name and password as well as the project id
        Returns:
        A DownloadBatch_Result object containing a Batch and Project object as well as a list of Field objects

      • submitBatch

        public boolean submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Params params)
        Submits the indexed record field values for a batch to the Server.
        Parameters:
        params - A SubmitBatch_Params object containing the user's name and password, the batch id and a string containing the indexed field values
        Returns:
        True or false depending on the success of the operation

      • getFields

        public GetFields_Result getFields(UserAndProject_Params params)
        Returns information about all of the fields for the specified project. If no project is specified, returns information about all of the fields for all projects in the system.
        Parameters:
        params - A UserAndProject_Params object containing the user's name and password as well as the project id
        Returns:
        A GetFields_Result object containing a list of Field_Result objects

      • search

        public java.util.List<Search_Result> search(Search_Params params)
        Searches the indexed records for the specified strings.
        Parameters:
        params - A Search_Params object containing the user's name and password as well as a list of fields to search and a list of strings to search for
        Returns:
        A list of Search_Result objects

      • downloadFile

        public byte[] downloadFile(java.net.URL url)
        Returns the bytes of a file.
        Parameters:
        url - The url of the file to download
        Returns:
        The bytes of the downloaded file
